markdownRemark.html:
Check Date

Works on 2019-03-04 11:33:56+0800

Question

How calculate the day of the week of a date in ruby ?

Answer

require(‘date’)

today.wday

Reference

  • https://stackoverflow.com/questions/4044574/how-calculate-the-day-of-the-week-of-a-date-in-ruby
